articles.title: 'People are just not worried about being scammed' - BBC.com
articles.description: Fraudsters are increasingly using AI, but are people taking the problem seriously enough?
articles.content:

articles.title: Škoda releases the first silhouette of the all-new battery-electric Elroq - ŠKODA Storyboard
articles.description: Mladá Boleslav, 22 May 2024 – Škoda Auto has released the first official silhouette images of the all-new Elroq. The fully electric compact SUV is Škoda’s first production model to adopt the Modern Solid design language. The minimalist exterior combines robus…
